00014 #define JOIN_(a,b) a ## b
00015 #define JOIN(a,b) JOIN_(a,b)
00016 #define JOIN3_(a,b,c) a ## b ## c
00017 #define JOIN3(a,b,c) JOIN3_(a,b,c)
00018 
00019 #undef  FLT
00020 #undef  VSIZE
00021 #undef  VSFX
00022 #undef  SFX
00023 #undef  VTYPE
00024 #undef  VMUL
00025 #undef  VADD
00026 #undef  VSTZ
00027 #undef  VLD1
00028 #undef  ALIGNPTR
00029 #undef  ALIGNSTRIDE
00030 #undef  VL_IMCONVCOL
00031 #undef  VL_IMCONVCOLTRI
00032 
00033 #if (FLOAT_TYPE == FLOAT_TYPE_FLOAT)
00034 #  define FLT    float
00035 #  define VSIZE  4
00036 #  define VSFX   ps
00037 #  define SFX    vf
00038 #  define VTYPE  __m128
00039 #else
00040 #  define FLT    double
00041 #  define VSIZE  2
00042 #  define VSFX   pd
00043 #  define SFX    vd
00044 #  define VTYPE  __m128d
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #define VMUL            JOIN(_mm_mul_,     VSFX)
00048 #define VADD            JOIN(_mm_add_,     VSFX)
00049 #define VSTZ            JOIN(_mm_setzero_, VSFX)
00050 #define VLD1            JOIN(_mm_load1_,   VSFX)
00051 #define ALIGNPTR        (sizeof(FLT) * VSIZE - 1)
00052 #define ALIGNSTRIDE     (VSIZE - 1)
00053 #define VL_IMCONVCOL    JOIN3(_vl_imconvcol_,    SFX, _sse2)
00054 #define VL_IMCONVCOLTRI JOIN3(_vl_imconvcoltri_, SFX, _sse2)
00055 
00056 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00057 void
00058 VL_IMCONVCOL (FLT* dst, int dst_stride,
00059               FLT const* src,
00060               int src_width, int src_height, int src_stride,
00061               FLT const* filt, int filt_begin, int filt_end,
00062               int step, unsigned int flags)
00063 {
00064   int x = 0 ;
00065   int y ;
00066   int dheight = (src_height - 1) / step + 1 ;
00067   vl_bool use_simd  = (src_stride & ALIGNSTRIDE) == 0 ;
00068   vl_bool transp    = flags & VL_TRANSPOSE ;
00069   vl_bool zeropad   = (flags & VL_PAD_MASK) == VL_PAD_BY_ZERO ;
00070   double totcol = 0 ;
00071   double simdcol = 0 ;
00072   
00073   /* let filt point to the last sample of the filter */
00074   filt += filt_end - filt_begin ;
00075   
00076   while (x < src_width) {
00077     /* Calculate dest[x,y] = sum_p image[x,p] filt[y - p]
00078      * where supp(filt) = [filt_begin, filt_end] = [fb,fe].
00079      * 
00080      * CHUNK_A: y - fe <= p < 0
00081      *          completes VL_MAX(fe - y, 0) samples
00082      * CHUNK_B: VL_MAX(y - fe, 0) <= p < VL_MIN(y - fb, height - 1)
00083      *          completes fe - VL_MAX(fb, height - y) + 1 samples
00084      * CHUNK_C: completes all samples
00085      */
00086     
00087     FLT const *filti ;
00088     int stop ; 
00089     
00090     if ((x + VSIZE < src_width) & 
00091         (((vl_intptr)(src + x) & ALIGNPTR) == 0) & 
00092         use_simd) 
00093     {
00094       /* ----------------------------------------------  Vectorized */
00095       for (y = 0 ; y < src_height ; y += step)  {
00096         union {VTYPE v ; FLT x [VSIZE] ; } acc ;
00097         VTYPE v, c ;
00098         FLT const *srci ;
00099         acc.v = VSTZ () ;
00100         v = VSTZ() ;
00101 
00102         filti = filt ;
00103         stop = filt_end - y ;
00104         srci = src + x - stop * src_stride ;
00105         
00106         if (stop > 0) {
00107           if (zeropad) {
00108             v = VSTZ () ;
00109           } else {
00110             v = * (VTYPE*) (src + x) ;
00111           } 
00112           while (filti > filt - stop) {
00113             c = VLD1 (filti--) ;
00114             acc.v = VADD (acc.v,  VMUL (v, c)) ;
00115             srci += src_stride ;
00116           }
00117         }
00118         
00119         stop = filt_end - VL_MAX(filt_begin, y - src_height + 1) + 1 ;
00120         while (filti > filt - stop) {
00121           v = * (VTYPE*) srci ; 
00122           c = VLD1 (filti--) ;
00123           acc.v = VADD (acc.v, VMUL (v, c)) ;
00124           srci += src_stride ;
00125         }
00126         
00127         if (zeropad) v = VSTZ () ;
00128         
00129         stop = filt_end - filt_begin + 1;
00130         while (filti > filt - stop) {
00131           c = VLD1 (filti--) ;
00132           acc.v = VADD (acc.v, VMUL (v, c)) ;
00133         }
00134         
00135         if (transp) {
00136           *dst = acc.x[0] ; dst += dst_stride ;
00137           *dst = acc.x[1] ; dst += dst_stride ;
00138 #if(VSIZE == 4)
00139           *dst = acc.x[2] ; dst += dst_stride ;
00140           *dst = acc.x[3] ; dst += dst_stride ;          
00141 #endif
00142           dst += 1 * 1 - VSIZE * dst_stride ;
00143         } else {
00144           *dst = acc.x[0] ; dst += 1 ;
00145           *dst = acc.x[1] ; dst += 1 ;      
00146 #if(VSIZE == 4)
00147           *dst = acc.x[2] ; dst += 1 ;
00148           *dst = acc.x[3] ; dst += 1 ;
00149 #endif
00150           dst += 1 * dst_stride - VSIZE * 1 ;
00151         }        
00152       } /* next y */
00153       if (transp) {
00154         dst += VSIZE * dst_stride - dheight * 1 ;
00155       } else {
00156         dst += VSIZE * 1 - dheight * dst_stride ;
00157       }
00158       x       += VSIZE ;
00159       simdcol += VSIZE ;
00160       totcol  += VSIZE ;
00161     } else {
00162       /* -------------------------------------------------  Vanilla */
00163       for (y = 0 ; y < src_height ; y += step) {
00164         FLT acc = 0 ;  
00165         FLT v = 0, c ;
00166         FLT const* srci ;
00167         
00168         filti = filt ;
00169         stop = filt_end - y ;
00170         srci = src + x - stop * src_stride ;
00171         
00172         if (stop > 0) {   
00173           if (zeropad) {
00174             v = 0 ;
00175           } else {
00176             v = *(src + x) ;
00177           }
00178           while (filti > filt - stop) { 
00179             c = *filti-- ;
00180             acc += v * c ;
00181             srci += src_stride ;
00182           }
00183         }
00184         
00185         stop = filt_end - VL_MAX(filt_begin, y - src_height + 1) + 1 ;
00186         while (filti > filt - stop) {
00187           v = *srci ; 
00188           c = *filti-- ;
00189           acc += v * c ;
00190           srci += src_stride ;
00191         }
00192         
00193         if (zeropad) v = 0 ;
00194         
00195         stop = filt_end - filt_begin + 1 ;
00196         while (filti > filt - stop) {
00197           c = *filti-- ;
00198           acc += v * c ;
00199         }
00200         
00201         if (transp) {
00202           *dst = acc ; dst += 1 ;          
00203         } else {
00204           *dst = acc ; dst += dst_stride ;
00205         }
00206       } /* next y */
00207       if (transp) {
00208         dst += 1 * dst_stride - dheight * 1 ;
00209       } else {
00210         dst += 1 * 1 - dheight * dst_stride ;
00211       }
00212       x      += 1 ;
00213       totcol += 1 ;
00214     } /* next x */
00215   }
00216 }
00217 
00218 #if 0
00219 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00220 VL_EXPORT
00221 void
00222 VL_IMCONVCOLTRI (FLT* dst, int dst_stride,
00223                  FLT const* src,
00224                  int src_width, int src_height, int src_stride,
00225                  int filt_size,
00226                  int step, unsigned int flags)
00227 {
00228   int x = 0 ;
00229   int y ;
00230   int dheight = (src_height - 1) / step + 1 ;
00231   vl_bool use_simd  = ((src_stride & ALIGNSTRIDE) == 0) && 
00232   (! (flags & VL_NO_SIMD)) ;
00233   vl_bool transp = flags & VL_TRANSPOSE ;
00234   vl_bool zeropad = (flags & VL_PAD_MASK) == VL_PAD_BY_ZERO ;
00235   
00236   FLT * buff = vl_malloc(sizeof(FLT) * (src_height + filt_size)) ;
00237 #define fa (1.0 / (double) (filt_size + 1))
00238   FLT scale = fa*fa*fa*fa ;  
00239   buff += filt_size ;
00240   
00241   while (x < src_width) {
00242     FLT const *srci ;
00243 
00244     use_simd = 0 ;
00245     if ((x + VSIZE < src_width) & 
00246         (((vl_ptrint)(src + x) & ALIGNPTR) == 0) & 
00247         use_simd) 
00248     {
00249       
00250     } else {
00251       int stridex = transp ? dst_stride : 1 ;
00252       int stridey = transp ? 1 : dst_stride ;
00253       srci = src + x + src_stride * (src_height - 1) ;
00254       
00255       /* integrate backward the column */
00256       buff [src_height - 1] = *srci ;
00257       for (y = src_height-2 ; y >=  0 ; --y) {
00258         srci -= src_stride ;
00259         buff [y] = buff [y+1] + *srci ;
00260       }
00261       if (zeropad) {
00262         for ( ; y >= - filt_size ; --y) {
00263           buff [y] = buff [y+1] ;          
00264         }
00265       } else {
00266         for ( ; y >= - filt_size ; --y) {
00267           buff [y] = buff[y+1] + *srci ;
00268         }
00269       }
00270       
00271       /* compute the filter forward */
00272       for (y = - filt_size ; y < src_height - filt_size ; ++y) {
00273         buff [y] = buff [y] - buff [y + filt_size] ;
00274       }
00275       if (! zeropad) {
00276         for (y = src_height - filt_size ; y < src_height ; ++y) {
00277           buff [y] = buff [y] - buff [src_height-1]  * 
00278           (src_height - filt_size - y) ;
00279         } 
00280       }
00281       
00282       /* integrate forward the column */
00283       for (y = - filt_size + 1 ; y < src_height ; ++y) {
00284         buff [y] += buff [y - 1] ;
00285       } 
00286       
00287       /* compute the filter backward */
00288       for (y = src_height - 1 ; y >= 0 ; --y) {
00289         dst [x*stridex + y*stridey] 
00290         = scale * (buff [y] - buff [y - filt_size]) ;
00291       }
00292     } /* next y */
00293     x += 1 ;
00294   }
00295   vl_free (buff - filt_size) ;
00296 }
00297 #endif
